definition: building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: The filter-through of stimulus cash to the pachinko parlours has historical precedent.
sentences.chinese: 彈球館通過現金刺激計劃受益是有歷史先例。

sentences.english: That year Allen opened a new arena named the Rose Garden.
sentences.chinese: 那一年阿倫建了個新球館，並命名爲玫瑰花園。

sentences.english: The Macdonalds finished supper at Macdonald's, then bowled at the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 麥可糖那一家在麥當勞喫過晚飯後去球館打保齡。

sentences.english: Kathy and Susan are about to book a lane in their local bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 凱西和蘇珊正在當地的一家保齡球館準備預約球道。

sentences.english: “He was a janitor in a bowling alley, ” Haggis told me.
sentences.chinese: “他是一個保齡球館看門人，”哈吉斯告訴我。

sentences.english: In short, kind of like the worst of the worst when it comes to bowling alleys.
sentences.chinese: 總之，像最嚴重的當涉及到保齡球館最壞的一種。

sentences.english: Tennis hall and outdoor courts in the hotel park.
sentences.chinese: 網球館和室外球場在酒店停車場。

sentences.english: Coach Rogers and Lue stepped in and helped with some of the drills.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑斯和盧教練走進球館開始幫我們練習。

sentences.english: There is a bowling alley, but you need to pay.
sentences.chinese: 有個保齡球館，但你得付錢。

sentences.english: Fans would undoubtedly flock to arenas to witness it all in person.
sentences.chinese: 球迷們毫無疑問將湧向球館親眼目睹球星的風采。

sentences.english: The Macdonalds finished supper at Macdonald's, and then bowled at the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 麥可糖那一家在麥當勞喫過晚飯後去球館打保齡。

sentences.english: Sold-out arenas were the just the tip of the iceberg, Pastuszek believes.
sentences.chinese: 帕斯圖斯澤克相信，球館爆滿僅僅只是冰山一角。

sentences.english: “He was a janitor in a bowling alley,” Haggis told me.
sentences.chinese: “他是保齡球館看門人，”哈吉斯告訴我。

sentences.english: The Kings currently play at Arco Arena.
sentences.chinese: 國王隊目前在阿科球館打球。

sentences.english: We share it with the Clippers.
sentences.chinese: 我們和快船共用一個球館。

sentences.english: Good morning, this is Longmarch Bowling Center.
sentences.chinese: 早上好，這裏是琅邁保齡球館。

definition: the right to host (an international meeting)

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1
